name: 張怡敏
objective:
本課程旨在經由對文化經濟學的認知，解讀文化經濟的發展邏輯與運行機制，建構文化經濟知識體系，期能為文化市場與文化產業發展提供理論基礎與思維座標。課程主要內容，一為在經濟邏輯運行下的文化活動，諸如文化產品、文化事業、文化資本、文化產業、文化市場等；另一為經濟活動所反映與體現的文化因素，以及對經濟運行產生作用的思維價值等。
The course aims through awareness of cultural economics to interpret the development logic and operating mechanism of cultural economy and to construct a cultural economic knowledge system, and is expected to provide the theoretical basis and thinking coordinates for the development of cultural markets and cultural industries.
The main content of the course is economic logics underpinned cultural activities, such as cultural products, cultural business, cultural capital, cultural industries and cultural markets; on the other hand, cultural factors reflected and experienced by economic activities, as well as the value of thinking which plays an important role in economic activities.
